page.title: 05SONNING COMMON SCHOOL
page.content: Sonning Common Primary School was built in two sections the old and the new. The old section was built in 1913 and holds four classes and the new section built in 1969 also holds four classes. There is one more building that holds one class and the staffroom. There is a school for handicapped children near, and three classes of them are now part of our school. We also have a playgroup here. The games we play on our field are: Football,Rugby,Cricket,Hockey and rounders.We also have netball which is played on the playground. There is a swimming pool for the juniors and top infants to use,and a school aviary with some finches in it. The two halls are used for different things,one we use for music,and the other for P.E.,assembly and dinners.
